description:
Calendar Weather puts the daily weather forecast on your WebOS calendar.   Just enter your zip code and select how frequently you want the forecast updated.  Calendar Weather uses the palm synergy capabilities to put the National Weather Service forecast for your selected zip code as an all day event on your calendar and then keeps it current.  Eliminates the need to jump back and forth between apps and sites when you are planning your day or week.   Also supports removing all forecast information.  
United States forecasts only.   Additional capabilities already in the works for the next version include:  Hourly weather for the current day, use current GPS location, and allow multiple locations to have forecasts included on the calendar.  Calendar Weather 1.0.0 is compatible with WebOS versions up through and including 1.4.5.   An updated version of Calendar Weather is in the works to support WebOS 2.0 and above.
